output.sentences: He woke up and took a selfie for the start of the day.
This male visited his grandma for his birthday.
He posed with a male hair stylist and his other friends.
He asked her help with shaving his hair and got his female friend to do it.
He felt glad to have his hair cut since he would see his boss that night.
